text:
PET的主要內容包括一系列的溝通與解決衝突技巧，這些技巧旨在促進理解、尊重和合作，避免使用權威式的教育方式。 其核心內容包括：
1. 主動傾聽（Active Listening）
• 這是一種非評價性、專注的聆聽方式，旨在幫助父母理解子女的情緒和需求，並建立信任。 主動傾聽需要父母以開放的態度接受孩子的表達，並透過反映孩子的感受來進行回應。
2. 我訊息（I-Messages）
trans:
The main content of PET includes a series of communication and conflict resolution skills designed to promote understanding, respect, and cooperation while avoiding authoritarian teaching methods. Its core components include:
1. Active Listening
• This is a non-evaluative, focused listening method aimed at helping parents understand their children’s emotions and needs, building trust in the process. Active listening requires parents to adopt an open attitude toward their children’s expressions and respond by reflecting their children’s feelings.
2. I-Messages
